skills.name: Bone-Shattering Cold
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Soulrend Coldstream
skills.desc: Deals massive Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Icy Rain of Annihilation
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Heartless Annihilator Call
skills.desc: Summons Lances of the Eternal Freeze.

skills.name: Genesis Chord
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a high chance of causing Imprisonment.

skills.name: The Creation's Prelude
skills.desc: Enters the Charge state. The next action uses "Last Choir of Genesis" on all targets.

skills.name: Last Choir of Genesis
skills.desc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Harbinger of Annihilation
skills.desc: Locks Onto a single target. The next action uses "Soulrend Coldstream."

skills.name: Creator's Resolve
skills.desc: After changing phases, slightly increases SPD and deals Imaginary DMG when attacking.
